## ğŸ” Checklist

### Code

- [ ] Code builds without errors
- [ ] Public APIs include Go doc comments (if applicable)
- [ ] No breaking changes were introduced unintentionally
- [ ] Follows project structure and conventions

### Quality & Testing

- [ ] Tests added or updated when applicable
- [ ] Existing tests pass (`make test`)
- [ ] Lint/static analysis passes (`make lint`)
- [ ] No typos (`lefthook` will run `typos` automatically)

### Documentation

- [ ] README updated if behavior, usage, or CLI changed
- [ ] Changelog entry added if necessary (for future releases)
